extension.summary: A Script to clean Kodi's video database
extension.description: This program add-on will clean streams, old missing files and general junk from your video database. Works with both MySQL and SQLite libraries.[CR]As well as removing old streams and missing files, the script can optionally remove or rename a specific path. Please see the README or the forum thread for details (http://forum.kodi.tv/showthread.php?tid=272112).
extension.disclaimer: Whilst every effort has been taken to ensure it doesn't, this script could break your database. Always make sure you back it up !!
